header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Food, Menu choices, table plan/seating arrangements, dementia, buying fish, candles, rearranging cupboards, photographs, Great British Bake Off.
header.activity: Planning birthday meal for mother in law/grandmother
